name: aospa-pico
tagline: code for compiling aospa for pico
body:
### Welcome to aospa-pico
here you will find code and a few patches necessary for building aospa for pico.

updated on: 10 September 2014

```
$ echo "get your hands dirty!"
```

Code Base: [https://github.com/AOSPA-legacy](https://github.com/AOSPA-legacy)

List of repositories to patch:

1. android_build
2. android_frameworks_av
3. android_frameworks_base
4. android_vendor_pa

####android_build
* removing auditd from compilation
* removing webviewchromium from bootclasspath
* revert adding prebuilt chromium support scripts
 
####android_frameworks_av
* Camera: QCOM legacy definitions,HTC cam switch,NO_UPDATE_PREVIEW
* Added support legacy Qualcomm OpenMAX IL libs for MSM7x27
* libstagefright: Enable meta mode for 7x27a video encoder 
* legacy OMX: handle QCOM colorformat
* use hw_get_module_by_class
* Remove CAMERA_CMD_METADATA && LONGSHOT calls

####android_frameworks_base
* add resized missing drawables to drawable-mdpi 
* fix for metadata, longshot

####android_vendor_pa
* products/: add pico defines 

List of repositories to sync:

1. android_device_htc_pico (android-4.4_aospa-legacy)
2. android_kernel_htc_pico (android-4.4)
3. proprietary_vendor_htc_pico (android-4.4)
4. android_external_webkit (cm-11.0) (external repo [HERE](https://github.com/androidarmv6/android_external_webkit/))

###Current Status

####not working:

+ Video Recording
+ Sound Playback
+ feel report an issue [here](https://github.com/aospa-pico/aospa-pico.github.io/issues/new)
 
That's about it, for building aospa-legacy for pico. Please do send in pull requests, if you can fix some of the errors, or building new features, etc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
